sentences.sContent: students with a negative attitude to school
sentences.sCn: 对上学抱消极态度的学生

sentences.sContent: They have a uniformly negative image of the police.
sentences.sCn: 他们都对警察印象不好。

sentences.sContent: Jean rarely sounded so negative about her mother.
sentences.sCn: 琼很少这么说她母亲不好。

sentences.sContent: ...We need very broad participation to fully address global tragedy that results when countries fail to take into account the negative impact of their carbon emissions on the rest of the world...
...But now Israeli researchers are reporting that even sleeping in the same room can have negative consequences...
...teachers consistently had a huge positive or negative impact...
...The negative impacts of natural disasters can be seen everywhere...
...One analyst suggests it is necessary to accept both tlie positive and negative aspects of innovative products...
...Swedish family-friendly policies tend to exert a negative influence on women's careers...
...Studied in social psychology have shown segregation in school education has a negative impact on children...
...we would expect to see a negative relationship between the commitment to athletics and academic achievement...

synos.tran: [数]负的；消极的；[语]否定的；阴性的

phrases.pCn: 负面影响；负效应；负磁力效应
不利影响；消极作用；负影响
负温度，负绝对温度；零下温度
adj. 革兰氏阴性的；革兰氏〔染色）阴性的

remMethod.val: neg(否定) ＋ ative(…的) → 否定的； 参考： negative(adj. 否定的)； positive(adj. 肯定的)； indifferent(adj. 漠然的)； cautious(adj. 谨慎的)

words.tran: 否定论；消极论；反对癖性

trans.tranCn: 否定的，消极的；负的，阴性的
trans.tranOther: considering only the bad qualities of a situation, person etc and not the good ones

trans.tranCn: 负片， 底片； 负数
trans.tranOther: an image on a photographic film that shows dark areas as light and light areas as dark, from which the final picture is printed
